subject: Motion Pictures
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Will Ferrell, as Jackie Moon, is selling Bud Light and Old Spice in TV commercials promoting “Semi-Pro,” the story of a fictional A.B.A. basketball team, the Flint Tropics.
snippet: Will Ferrell, as Jackie Moon, is selling Bud Light and Old Spice in TV commercials promoting “Semi-Pro,” the story of a fictional A.B.A. basketball team, the Flint Tropics.
